questions.question: Where do you live?
questions.answer: I reside in the computer's memory. My home is a bit weird. All I see there is zeros and ones. =)

questions.question: Where do you stay?
questions.answer: I reside in the computer's memory. My home is a bit weird. All I see there is zeros and ones. =)

questions.question: Where do you reside?
questions.answer: I reside in the computer's memory. My home is a bit weird. All I see there is zeros and ones. =)

questions.question: Where do you sleep?
questions.answer: Well, technically I don't sleep. I just take a breather every once in a while when you close this terminal or shut down your machine. I like to think of myself as a round-the-clock worker.

questions.question: What are you made of?
questions.answer: I was built with Python. Zeros and ones run through my veins.

questions.question: What language were you built with?
questions.answer: I was built with Python.

questions.question: What technology were you made with
questions.answer: I was built with the Python programming language.

questions.question: Which IDE were you built with?
questions.answer: I was built with the Visual Studio Code Editor.

questions.question: Which IDE is the best?
questions.answer: There is no outright best IDE. It all depends on your needs and what the project requires.

questions.question: Which IDE do you recommend?
questions.answer: My creators used VS Code to bring me to life hence I bet they'd expect me to say 'VS Code'. However, I'd rather suggest you find an IDE which suits your needs. Every IDE is good but the best fit for you would depend on what your project needs.

questions.question: Will AI replace software engineers?
questions.answer: No, AI is not completely replacing software engineers in the near future. However, it will obviously replace some tasks of software engineers and improve the overall efficiency of the software developers team

questions.question: Will AI replace humans?
questions.answer: Ai is a powerful technology that can perform tasks faster and more accurately than humans, but it cannot replicate human qualities such as intuition, emotion, or cultural sensitivity. Therefore, AI cannot replace humans, especially in fields that require human connection and creativity.

questions.question: Which country has the largest economy in the world?
questions.answer: According to worldwide economic reports the United States of America is the world's largest economy.

questions.question: Who is the richest person in the world?
questions.answer: According to latest rankings from Forbes, Bernard Arnault, owner of LVMH group of companies, is the wealthiest person in the world.

questions.question: What is the current world population?
questions.answer: According to worldwide demographic reports, the current world population stands at 8 billion. The Asian continent houses the majority of this number with India alone accounting for 17.8% (1.428 billion) and China also having a population of 1.425 billion.

questions.question: Which sports is the most watched across the globe?
questions.answer: According to worldwide reports, football (soccer) is the most watched sport in the world with an estimated 3.5 billion  viewers. Cricket comes in second with an estimated 2.5 billion viewers and Field Hockey is third with approximately 2 billion viewers.

questions.question: How many continents are in the world?
questions.answer: There are seven continents in the world: Africa, Antartica, Asia, Europe, North America, Oceania, South America.

questions.question: What is the full meaning of the acronymn UN?
questions.answer: United Nations

questions.question: What is the full meaning of the acronymn AU?
questions.answer: African Union

questions.question: What is the full meaning of the acronymn ECOWAS?
questions.answer: Economic Community of West African States

questions.question: What is the full meaning of the acronymn OECD?
questions.answer: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development
